description.name: Enom
description.tagline: A leading reseller domain registrar supporting over 20 million domains.
description.long:
## Apply for an account
WHMCS users get exclusive access to signup with no setup fees and preferential pricing. [Learn more and signup »](https://www.whmcs.com/free-domain-reseller-account/?utm_source=in_product&utm_medium=apps)
features: Ability to View/Change Nameservers & WHOIS Info
Domain Locking, ID Protection, EPP Code Retrieval
DNS Host Record Management, Email Forwarding & Private Nameservers
